title: (x) classified ads - Poynter Agate {Jay Fraser}
content:
This one is driving me nuts. It's really close to a lot of fonts, but not quite there. It's from the classified section of a newspaper in Florida.   
   
I hope I'm not missing something obvious. It doesn't match anything I have, and Identifont didn't lead me to the right one, either. Thanks!   
   
 ![want ads](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103164639im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16105.jpg)
author: jay

comments.content:
Waitasecond ... Font Bureau's Poynter Agate?   
   
I can't tell from their sample in their book, but it looks really close.   
   
(OK, so I forgot I had their catalog...)

I'm pretty sure that's it.   
   
Poynter Agate is a "call for pricing" font, so I'm guessing Font Bureau doesn't publish a full sample so as to keep it out of the hands of dirty, stinkin' font pirates.   
   
BTW, Sept 19th is International Talk Like A Pirate Day. Pass it on, Mateys!   
   
(Did you like that segue?)
Jay it wouldn't suprise me that its a Font Bureau face, they pride themselfs that they design fonts for newspapers and publications, Dan
